title: Fifth Circuit Court says Biden’s coronavirus vaccine mandate is illegal, page 1
cleaned_text:
edit on 3/24/23 by Ksihkehe because: Typo



This has been a trend since even before COVID and not just at the federal level. Since the media is in the sack with the political elite their unlawful rules get endorsed and end up socially enforced even as they wind their way through court.It's a very bad practice to normalize and I hope Republicans don't start doing it using the excuse that Democrats did it first. Executive orders need revision, but they need to do it without turning the POTUS into an even more hollow puppet position. The legislative branch has enough power to fix the problems that have persisted for decades and they've ceded it to agency bureaucrats so they can better focus on their endless PR campaigns and personal wealth.If we hired 87,000 forensic accountants to audit the government and Fed instead of IRS agents to harass the middle class it would be a start. I think we'd clean out Congress, get rid of agency mission creep, and solve our fiscal problems fairly quickly. May need to make some new space in the prisons though.
